Author: <%= extension.author_name %>
DispatchInfoList:
<Extension Id="<%= extension.id %>">
./<%= extension.mainPath %> ./<%= extension.scriptPath %>
true
Panel <%= extension.name %>
<%= extension.size.normal.height %> <%= extension.size.normal.width %>
<%= extension.size.max.height %> <%= extension.size.max.width %>
<%= extension.size.min.height %> <%= extension.size.min.width %>
./CSXS/panel-icons/<%= extension.icons.panel.light.normal %> ./CSXS/panel-icons/<%= extension.icons.panel.light.hover %> ./CSXS/panel-icons/<%= extension.icons.panel.light.disabled %> ./CSXS/panel-icons/<%= extension.icons.panel.dark.normal %> ./CSXS/panel-icons/<%= extension.icons.panel.dark.hover %>
